title: Miguel Indurain says Sepp Kuss can win Vuelta a España if he can handle the pressure
content:
Five-time Tour de France winner says the key for Kuss will be his mental fortitude: 'To be a leader, you have to be mentally very strong as well.'

Read the full article at Miguel Indurain says Sepp Kuss can win Vuelta a España if he can handle the pressure on Velo.
author: ahood
